author: Paul Vigna
title: Bitcoin Lawyer Marco Santori Moves From Law Firm Cooley to Startup
text:
Marco Santori, a partner at the law firm Cooley LLP and one of the best-known lawyers in the digital-currency sector, is leaving to become president of bitcoin-services company Blockchain.
Mr. Santori is replacing co-founder Nicolas Cary, who will remain involved with the firm through his role on the board.
